lines.text: [Lorraine frets when a black cat crosses their path]
Well, just a few minutes with this man Conrad and we'll be back out on the ocean - where there are no black cats.

[to Captain Matthews]
Say, Captain, where is the...
[spots Jerry and Lorraine having a romantic conversation]
Uh-oh. Captain, let me show you the latest thing in oceans.
Where did you say this boat was going?
Well, do you think there'd be room for an extra passenger?
